name: This website
description: Repository holding this website's code. I am proud of the dynamic content loading, which allows me to easily change any of the website's content without touching the source code itself

name: NCGM's Website
description: Website of the Nucleus of Computer Graphics and Multimedia (NCGM)

name: Jornadas da Ciência da Informação
description: Website for the 2023 edition of the "Jornadas da ciência da Informação")

name: Atlas of Anatomical Pathology
description: An online Atlas of Anatomical Pathology. An educative tool made for a Veterinary Medicine University teacher. Still missing content, but it will be up and running in no time!

name: FEUP Hell
description: Preliminary project developed for the 2023 edition of the Game Design and Development class of M.EIC.

name: Arch Quick Setup
description: Some scripts and files to make setting up arch on a fresh install just the way I like it simple and easy, with just a few simple strokes and key presses. Constant WIP.

name: Library Tracker
description: Command line utility I made to track my card collection. Allows adding cards to a collection, removing them, editing, etc.. Additionally, this program fetches prices for Yu-Gi-Oh cards in the collection from cardmarket.

name: SRT Editor
description: Simple srt file editing tool created to aid me in my manual modification (and occasional creation) of subtitle files.

name: Pibox Quick Setup
description: Some scripts and files to make setting up my raspberry pi emulation station on a fresh install.

name: Magic: the Gathering (and Processing of Information)
description: Repository for the project of the PRI class of the year 2022/2023. We retrieved data, indexed it, and developed a search system for Magic: the Gathering cards.

name: [] Invaders
description: Repository for MIEIC's LCOM class of the year 2020/2021. Contains the lab assignments and my final project project for the class, a clone of the classic Space Invaders.

name: SGI Final Project
description: Final project developed for the Interactive Graphics Systems class of MIEIC. An interactive, animated 3D chess gameplay environment, which can parse and render different scene files provided to it in xml format.
